TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MissingMemberException extends System.MemberAccessException
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MissingMemberException extends System.MemberAccessException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type MissingMemberException = class inherit MemberAccessException interface ISerializable
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MissingMemberException extends System.MemberAccessException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 当尝试动态访问一个不存或未声明为公共的类成员时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when there is an attempt to dynamically access a class member that does not exist or that is not declared as public.

summary.span: 如果类库中的某个成员已移除或重命名，请重新编译引用该库的所有程序集。

span.span: If a member in a class library has been removed or renamed, recompile any assemblies that reference that library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，如果代码尝试访问不存在的类成员，则会生成编译错误。Normally a compilation error is generated if the code attempts to access a nonexistent member of a class. 旨在处理在一个程序集中删除或重命名某一字段或方法，但该更改未反映在另一个程序集中的情况。 is designed to handle cases where a field or a method is deleted or renamed in one assembly and the change is not reflected in a second assembly. 在运行时，当第二个程序集中的代码尝试访问第一个程序集中缺少的成员时，将引发 。At runtime, will be thrown when the code in the second assembly attempts to access the missing member in the first assembly. 是 和 的基类。 is the base class for and . 通常，更好的方法是使用 的派生类之一，以便更准确地指示错误的确切性质。In general it is better to use one of the derived classes of to more precisely indicate the exact nature of the error. 如果你只想要捕获缺少成员错误的一般情况，则会引发 。Throw a if you are only interested in capturing the general case of a missing member error. 使用值为0x80131512 的 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGMEMBER。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGMEMBER, that has the value 0x80131512. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 此示例演示当你尝试使用反射来调用不存在的方法并访问不存在的字段时会发生的情况。This example shows what happens if you attempt to use reflection to call a method that does not exist and access a field that does not exist. 应用程序通过捕获 、和 进行恢复。The application recovers by catching the , , and . [!code-cpp[MissingMethodException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/cpp/MissingMethodException.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MissingMethodException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/CS/MissingMethodException.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MissingMethodException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MissingMethodException/vb/missingmethodexception.vb#1)]

span.span: Handling and Throwing Exceptions

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如 "尝试访问缺少的成员。"This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Attempted to access a missing member." 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应该是用户可以理解的内容。The content of the `message` parameter should be understandable by the user. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

summary.span: 使用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间调用此构造函数以重新构造在流上传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization).

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常根本原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the root cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常可以在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会设置 ，对所有异常对象数据进行序列化。 sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在反序列化期间，将从通过流传输 重建异常对象。During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取文本字符串，它显示类名、成员名称，以及缺失成员的签名。

span.span: Gets the text string showing the class name, the member name, and the signature of the missing member.
The error message string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在构造对象时未指定类名，则返回从基类继承的默认文本字符串。If the class name is not specified when the object is constructed, the default text string inherited from the base class is returned. 此属性将重写 。This property overrides . 应本地化错误消息。The error message should be localized. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 的属性。The following example demonstrates the property. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含一个 值，该值表示缺少的成员的签名。 contains a value that represents the signature of the missing member. 用于设置签名格式。 is used to format the signature. 有关其他信息，请参阅 ，以及 。For additional information, see , , and .
